txt.en: 'You have decided to join us in defending my people....'
'Come! We have broken through their lines... let us continue!'
Instance: In Defence of Eaworth

'Ah... what glory I may... have earned has been overshadowed... by grief. To know that... Saruman the White has betrayed us is terrible... enough, but to know that he used... my grandmother as the tool is a... deathly blow.'
You lift Ingmar and carry him away.
You have broken through the mounted defences of Maustazg
You have broken through to the central camp of Maustazg
Defeated Hoital
Speak with Lord Ingmar.
<rgb=#FF0000>Lord Ingmar perished</rgb>
Fight your way through the mounted defences of Maustazg.
<rgb=#FF0000>Lord Ingmar perished</rgb>
Speak with Lord Ingmar.
Fight your way to the centre of Maustazg.
'If you desire my respect, you must earn it here on the battlefield!'
Confront Hoital, leader of the Orcs at Maustazg.
Defeat Hoital.
Ingmar lies wounded in the central camp of Maustazg.\n\nYou should speak with Ingmar and leave Maustazg behind.
Listen to what Hoital has to say.
Talk to Ingmar
Fight through the mounted defences of Maustazg
Talk to Ingmar
Fight your way to the centre of Maustazg
Confront Hoital
Defeat Hoital and his minions
'Your grandmother, the old battle-axe, softened up your father for us, just like Sharkû instructed.'
Talk to Ingmar
'Ah, but I have proof of the old woman's cooperation...'
<rgb=#FF0000>Lord Ingmar must survive</rgb>
'I knew that you were of solid character, [placeholder]. Only by driving the Orcs from our lands can we truly defend Eaworth....'
'Here! Her signet... proof that even you cannot deny!'
'Your efforts are laughable!'
'Now be done with these fools!'
Listen to the conversation
'I only hope that Wulfrad and his army from Thornhope arrive in time... we are woefully outnumbered!'
'Until then... for Eaworth, for honour, for glory, forth the Léotharningas!'
'You lie, Orc! Lady Góda would never treat with the likes of you!'
'I will end this farce!'
'Even should you defeat me, your fate has been decided, worms.'
Lord Ingmar has launched an assault upon the Orcs at Maustazg.
'Ha! You think that you have won? Fools!'
